term.title: Bell–Evans–Polanyi principle

item.text: The linear relation between energy of activation(Ea) and enthalpy of reaction (ΔHr) sometimes observed within a series of closely related reactions.

item.meaning: Activation energy related to enthalphy of reaction

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 1077. 'Glossary of terms used in physical organic chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 1088 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466051077)
